title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When attempting to set a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0' or just returning a null result set, the software behaves incorrectly.
OB: The software does not return the expected result set when an invalid filter expression is set.
EB: The software should display a relevant error message when an invalid filter expression is set.
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 
1. Set an invalid filter expression such as 'row[0] equals to 0'
2. Observe the result set or lack thereof.
